name: We don't die here (DEMO)
description:
STORY:

An entirely unknown threat has descended on your people, diminished your population to nearly nothing in 4 short weeks, and driven you from your home world; this is your extinction event.

You, Empress Asa, refuse to accept this.

But, you're about to be overrun...

GAMEPLAY:

-Turn based, attack telegraph combat. Enemy attacks will be telegraphed before the attack connects next turn. You must either dodge heavy attacks, or block light attacks, to avoid 100% of the damage. Failing to read a telegraph correctly and using the incorrect defense method results in you taking heavy damage.

-Puzzles. Although not present in the demo, the final version will sport puzzles in between combat.

-2 (sort of) endings. ("But wait-" I hear you ask. "This is just the start of the story. How are there 2 endings already?" You'll see what I mean when you play it.)
-1 hidden, collectable doll.

DEMO and Kickstarter:

This is a demo. I plan to kickstart the final version. Follow me on YouTube and/or my Discord server if you would like to be informed when the kickstarter for this game begins!

YouTube channel
Discord Server

This game shares the same universe as Ara and the Empty Universe and Our way down.

UPDATE 1.1: July 23, 2022.
-Fixed sequence break that occurs if you go to the town's East hub before clearing out the center.
-Day 1 update, yaaaaaaaay.
